summary: Adds a new robe to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Attention: UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL THIS BE UPLOADED TO STEAM WORKSHOP AND NO ONE REQUESTING PERMISSION TO DO SO WILL RECEIVE IT. THIS STATEMENT OVERRIDES ANYTHING IN THE PERMISSIONS POPUP THAT IS AVAILABLE ON NEXUS THAT CONFLICTS WITH THIS STATEMENT.

UPDATE: New version should be working perfectly now, if there are any issues with it, leave a comment detailing the problem.


This stand alone retexture was created at the request of user Kyuukei. It is based on the Mythic Dawn robes, and can be found on the altar at Azura\'s Shrine. This is only the robe, not the hood or the gloves or boots.

Currently it is unenchanted, another version will be released at a later date with some nifty effects.

Install with NMM, there is an alternate, slightly darker texture located in Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data/Textures/Clothes/Sepherose/Robes of the Silver Star/Alternate
A readme on switching the textures out is located there as well.

A note from Kyuukei:

I requested this because, while I love the mesh for the Mythic Dawn Robes, I rather dislike the default color scheme. I found the yellow a bit garish, and obstensibly the default robes are dyed with sacrificed blood. Ew. Black, silver, and non-bloodsoaked robes are far more my style, and I\'m rather pleased with how this has turned out.
author: Sepherose

files.name: Robes of the Silver Star v2
